column5: Tried my hand at painting some trolling spoons last winter. Without an airbrush, they certainly aren't works of art. When we were out today,decided - what the heck, nothing else has fired since the first 45 minutes out.   piggy here didn't seem too concerned about chowing down on the the ugly duckling of the lake   Brian B - I took your recommendation and went fly fishing. G caught this one on a green tinsel special I call the wet damsel    wasn't much, but it sure was better than the alternative. Happy father's day all.

Hahah awesome!!!  Looks like a great time!  They dont have to be pretty. I did a crank with some neon yellow glow in the dark crap from some craft store. And I caught bass like it was going outta style!. Lure was ugly as heck lol  And happy fathers day to you as well!
If it's green and glows, it's gonna slay on Lake O, from what I experienced anyway.  Nice lakers
Yup, lakers really don't care.  I always do well with black/purple 5ft off bottom.
that's just not true Rick....just NOT true.  A heck of a nice day wasn't it?
See, it worked. WTG G MAN  Nice report Rick.
